entry.title: cuynu/ytvanced
entry.summary:
YouTube Vanced & Vanced MicroG & YouTube Music Vanced Unofficial APK Download

YouTube Vanced

Another YouTube Vanced Unofficial projects based on ReVanced patches

Credit YouTube Vanced : Vanced Team, patches : ReVanced Extended

Worry about malware,backdoor or keylogger? See VirusTotal scan results

Download counts :

Discussion on GitHub (English)

Want to recevie new Updates? Watch this repository (Recommended) or Join Telegram update channel (Not recommended)

Join unofficial update channel

You can support me by give star for this repository or subscribe to my personal YouTube channel and disable the notification bell for my channel.

(Without Vanced MicroG, YouTube Vanced will crash due to missing MicroG, Please install Vanced MicroG below.)

(Không có Vanced MicroG, YouTube Vanced sẽ không chạy, vui lòng cài đặt Vanced MicroG bên dưới.)

  • Common problems and solution

  • Changelogs and known issues

  • YouTube Vanced Features : See on Wikipedia

  • Can't install on Xiaomi MIUI devices?, See how to fix that with workaround!

  • Architecture : Universal (arm64-v8a,armeabi-v7a,x86,x86_64)

  • Support all language supported by official YouTube client.

Download

Minimum Android version : 8 (Oreo) for version 17.41.34 and above, 6.0.0 for version 17.33.42 or older

Vanced MicroG (REQUIRED to use YouTube Vanced non-root version, not needed for root version)

Download Vanced MicroG 0.2.25.224113

Download Vanced MicroG 0.2.24.220220

YouTube Vanced non-root variant :

Unofficial version (Recommended) :

Latest version is : 17.45.36 (Changelogs)

Download YouTube Vanced Unofficial version 17.45.36 Black

Download YouTube Vanced Unofficial version 17.45.36 Dark

Download YouTube Vanced Unofficial version 17.45.36 Monet theme (Android 12+ only)

Download YouTube Vanced Unofficial version 17.45.34 Black

Download YouTube Vanced Unofficial version 17.45.34 Dark

Download YouTube Vanced Unofficial version 17.45.34 Monet theme (Android 12+ only)

Download YouTube Vanced Unofficial version 17.43.36 Black

Download YouTube Vanced Unofficial version 17.43.36 Dark

Download YouTube Music Vanced Unofficial version 5.33.51

Download YouTube Music Vanced Unofficial version 5.33.51 (Only armeabi-v7a,arm64-v8a

Download YouTube Music Vanced Unofficial version 5.31.50

Download YouTube Music Vanced Unofficial version 5.28.51

Download YouTube Music Vanced Unofficial version 5.28.51 (Only armeabi-v7a,arm64-v8a)

YouTube Vanced root variant [Magisk Module]

If module script not working, try extract the base.apk or youtube.apk from the zip and install it manually, then try again

Select update package if you want to update current installed YouTube Vanced Magisk Module without lose current settings, but if you have not installed or want to reinstall, please use normal Magisk Module (not label as UPDATE)

Download Magisk Module YouTube Vanced 17.45.36 Black

Download Magisk Module YouTube Vanced 17.45.36 Dark

Place holder for Monet variant

Download UPDATE Package Magisk Module YouTube Vanced 17.45.36 Black

Download UPDATE Package Magisk Module YouTube Vanced 17.45.36 Dark

Place holder for Monet variant

Download Magisk Module YouTube Vanced 17.45.34 Black

Download Magisk Module YouTube Vanced 17.45.34 Dark

Download Magisk Module YouTube Vanced 17.45.34 Monet (Android 12+ Only)

Download Magisk Module YouTube Vanced 17.43.36 Black

Download Magisk Module YouTube Vanced 17.43.36 Dark

YouTube Vanced old/outdated version:

You can download old/outdated version of YouTube Vanced, YouTube Music Vanced and Vanced MicroG here, BUT PLEASE DO NOT REPORT BUGS ON THESE VERSION.

Download YouTube Vanced Unofficial 17.42.33

Download YouTube Vanced Unofficial 17.41.34

Download YouTube Vanced Unofficial 17.33.42

Download YouTube Vanced Unofficial 17.28.34

Download YouTube Vanced Official 17.03.38

Download YouTube Music Vanced Unofficial 5.16.51

Download YouTube Music Vanced Official 4.64.51

Download old Vanced MicroG

YouTube Vanced for Android Car screen (Not Android Auto)

Do NOT DOWNLOAD THIS ON NON ANDROID CAR DEVICE

Most Android Car screen are only have armeabi-v7a architecture and running Android 10 with some CPU like Spreadtrum,Allwinner,Rockchip,etc

Android package name changed to com.android.car.vanced instead of com.vanced.android.youtube because some Android car screen are have YouTube Vanced official installed as system app and can't be uninstalled

Different : Only use armeabi-v7a architecture and black theme

Download YouTube Vanced 17.45.36 for Android Car screen

Download YouTube Vanced 17.45.34 for Android Car screen

Translate YouTube Vanced

You can contributor translate YouTube Vanced to your language by create pull requests to ReVanced Patches inotia00 . Your translation will change in next version if pull request has merged by inotia00, strings will change from ReVanced to Vanced automatically.

Open source

All of my YouTube Vanced unofficial builds are using these patches

ReVanced patches

ReVanced Extended patches tree

VirusTotal scan results and File Hashs

Because all my YouTube Vanced apk files are signed with debug keys, so some security vendor will flag it as malicious. Don't worry about this, its only a normal problem!

View YouTube Vanced/YouTube Music Vanced/Vanced MicroG VirusTotal Scan results/File Hash

Installation for MIUI

[Some Xiaomi device that running MIUI may not be able to install due to security check by Xiaomi and MIUI Optimization, you can workaround that by install Package Installer (Google) from APKMirror (Select version depend on your Android version) and turn off MIUI Optimization on Developer options then install YouTube Vanced client with Package Installer (Google) instead of default Xiaomi APK installer.]

Common problem and solution

If these solution isn't fix your problem, please create issues here.

No internet connection:

  • Remove your account from Vanced MicroG (If have and try again)
  • Wipe Vanced MicroG & YouTube Vanced & YouTube Music Vanced app data and cache
  • Enable auto start for Vanced MicroG if you use heavy customized Android version such as MIUI,OneUI,FlymeOS,HarmonyOS,etc
  • For Tecno user : Find and open Phone Master app, go to auto start manager, allow Vanced microG and YouTube Vanced auto start.

App not installed :

  • Free up some storage space and try again
  • Uninstall official YouTube Vanced client downloaded from Vanced Manager or other unknown sources then try again. Reason : Mismatch signature.
  • Make sure you have downloaded Universal version of YouTube Vanced/YouTube Music Vanced.

Crash when opening:

  • Install or reinstall Vanced MicroG
  • Turn off battery optimization for Vanced MicroG
  • Allow Vanced MicroG run on background or auto start (on heavy customized OS : MIUI,OneUI,FlymeOS,HarmonyOS,etc)
  • For Tecno user : Find and open Phone Master app, go to auto start manager, allow Vanced microG and YouTube Vanced auto start.
  • Wipe app data and cache
  • Reinstall YouTube Vanced client

Not responding when watch videos :

If you got YouTube Vanced not responding when watch a videos, that's because Return YouTube Dislike trying to get the dislikes from the API, but due to poor network conditions, RYD unable to get the metrics, resulting in unresponsive YouTube. Turn off RYD in settings if you often have unstable network connection.

Not responding when not watch any videos :

Check your device and make sure the official latest version of YouTube still run well on your device, Older devices will often have this problem because the hardware is too old.

There was a problem parsing the package:

  • Check your Android version, Make sure your current Android version meet minimum required Android version.
  • Redownload APK file.
